Pre-Game Insights: Michael O'Neill has improved Northern Ireland's belief after dropping down the international pecking order.
Northern Ireland has won their last three home matches and defeated Luxembourg in their previous match.
Bulgaria has not lost under Ilian Iliev but has drawn six out of seven matches.
Northern Ireland defeated Scotland 1-0 away in March, showing their capability against strong teams.
Bulgaria conceded just twice in their last five games before drawing with Belarus.
Northern Ireland have a choice between Josh Magennis and Dion Charles for the forward line.
Post-Match Reflections: We predict another low-scoring stalemate between Bulgaria and Northern Ireland.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Northern Ireland has extended their winning record at home to three consecutive matches.
Northern Ireland's last away success came before the match against Scotland in March.
